source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，一切皆得清淨天眼，能見百千俱胝那由他世界麁細色相；
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I cause all sentient beings to give rise to my lands. All of them attain the pure celestial eye, able to see the coarse and subtle forms of a hundred thousand quadrillions of worlds.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，一切皆得他心通，善能了知百千俱胝那由他眾心心所法；
translation: “Furthermore, having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I cause all sentient beings to be born in my own land. All of them attain the knowledge of the minds of others. They are able to know a hundred thousand quadrillions of minds and mental states.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，一切皆得住正信位，離顛倒想堅固修習；
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I cause all sentient beings to give rise to my lands. They all attain the state of right faith and are free from deluded conceptions, steadfastly cultivating it.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，所修正行善根無量，遍圓寂界而無間斷；
translation: Having attained enlightenment, I cause all sentient beings to give rise to my buddha-lands. The roots of goodness cultivated and practiced by me are immeasurable, pervading the realm of quiescence without interruption.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，雖住聲聞緣覺之位，往百千俱胝那由他寶剎之內，
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I cause all sentient beings to give rise to my buddha-land. Though they abide in the states of śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas, yet they go within hundreds of thousands of koṭis of billions of jeweled buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 遍作佛事；
translation: They perform buddha-work everywhere.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，一切皆得無邊光明，而能照曜百千俱胝那由他諸佛剎土；
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I cause all sentient beings to give rise to my buddha-lands. All of them attain boundless light, yet can illumine a hundred thousand koṭis of buddha-lands as many as there are buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，命不中夭，壽百千俱胝那由他劫；
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, all sentient beings will cause me to be born in my buddha-land. My life won’t be short, with a life span of one hundred thousand koṭis of eons.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，無不善名，聞無量無數諸佛剎土，
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I cause all sentient beings to give rise to my buddha-lands. There are no unwholesome names in my buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 無名、無號、無相、無形，無所稱讚，而無疑謗身心不動；
translation: They have no names, no epithets, no marks, and no forms, and nothing to praise; yet they do not doubt or criticize their bodies or minds.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生求生我剎，念吾名號發志誠心堅固不退，
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, all the sentient beings who seek to be born in my buddha-lands think of me as their name.

source_sentence: 彼命終時，我令無數苾芻現前圍繞來迎彼人，經須臾間得生我剎；
translation: At the time of their death, I caused innumerable bhikṣus to appear before me to surround them and greet them. In an instant they were born at my buddha-stage.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有十方無量無邊，無數世界一切眾生，聞吾名號發菩提心，
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, all sentient beings in countless worlds in the ten directions heard my name and aroused the aspiration for enlightenment.

source_sentence: 種諸善根隨意求生，諸佛剎土無不得生；
translation: They sow roots of goodness and seek to be produced as they wish, and none of the buddha-lands can produce them.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，皆具三十二種大丈夫相；
translation: All the sentient beings I cause to be born in my buddha-lands, having attained enlightenment and become perfectly awakened, all possess thirty-two marks of greatness.

source_sentence: 一生令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: One lifetime causes them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，若有大願未欲成佛為菩薩者，
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I cause all sentient beings to be born in my buddha-lands. If there are any great aspirations who do not want to become buddhas or bodhisattvas,

source_sentence: 我以威力，令彼教化一切眾生，皆發信心，修菩提行、普賢行、寂滅行、淨梵行、最勝行，
translation: By my spiritual power I cause all sentient beings there to develop faith and cultivate the practice of enlightenment, the practice of universal goodness, the practice of tranquility, the practice of pure and genuine austerity, and the supreme practice.

source_sentence: 及一切善行；
translation: and all wholesome practices.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生令生我剎，於一切處承事供養無量百千俱胝那由他諸佛，
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I cause all sentient beings to give rise to my buddha-land, serving and honoring innumerable hundreds of thousands of billions of buddhas everywhere.

source_sentence: 種諸善根，隨意所求無不滿願；
translation: They plant roots of goodness, wishing to fulfill whatever they wish.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，我剎土中所有菩薩，皆得成就一切智慧，善談諸法祕要之義；
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, all the enlightening beings in my buddha-lands will attain omniscience and be skilled in expounding the hidden essence of truth.

source_sentence: 不久速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Soon, he'll quickly attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，我居寶剎所有菩薩，發勇猛心運大神通，往無量無邊無數世界諸佛剎中，
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, the enlightening beings who live in my jeweled buddha-lands arouse their determination and carry out great spiritual powers. They go to the buddha-lands of infinite, boundless, countless worlds:

source_sentence: 以真珠、瓔珞、寶蓋、幢幡、衣服、臥具、飲食、湯藥、香華、伎樂，
translation: With genuine pearls, jewelry, jeweled canopies, pennants, banners, robes, bedding, food and drink, spices, fragrant flowers, and music.

source_sentence: 供養承事迴求菩提；
translation: They honored, served, and revered them in order to seek enlightenment.

source_sentence: 速得成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They'll quickly attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，我居寶剎所有菩薩，發大道心，欲以真珠、瓔珞、寶蓋、幢幡、衣服、臥具、飲食、湯藥、香華、伎樂，
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, all the bodhisattvas of my buddha-stage who live in the jeweled grove aroused the great aspiration for enlightenment. They wished to adorn themselves with genuine pearls, jewelry, precious canopies, banners, pennants, clothing, bedding

source_sentence: 承事供養他方世界無量無邊諸佛世尊，而不能往，我於爾時以宿願力，
translation: I served and honored infinite buddhas in other worlds but could not go there. At that time, by the power of my past vows, I entered nirvana without ever leaving home.

source_sentence: 令彼他方諸佛世尊，各舒手臂至我剎中受是供養；
translation: I will cause the buddhas and world-honored ones of other directions to each extend their arms and go to my buddha-land to receive this offering.

source_sentence: 令彼速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: He causes them to quickly achieve unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，我居寶剎所有菩薩，隨自意樂不離此界，欲以真珠、瓔珞、寶蓋、幢幡、衣服、臥具、飲食、湯藥、香華、伎樂，
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, the enlightening beings who live in my jeweled buddha-lands will not leave this world according to their wishes, wanting to give me genuine pearls, jewelry, precious canopies, banners, robes, bedding, food and drink, medicine, fragrant flowers,

source_sentence: 供養他方無量諸佛。
translation: They'll make offerings to measureless buddhas in other directions.

source_sentence: 又復思惟：「如佛展臂至此受供，劬勞諸佛令我無益。」
translation: Again, he thought, Suppose the Buddha spreads his arm and comes here to receive an offering, and it's useless to trouble the buddhas to cause me to do so.

source_sentence: 作是念時，我以神力，令此供具自至他方諸佛面前，一一供養。
translation: When I had this thought, I used my supernormal powers to cause these offerings to go on their own to the buddhas in other directions and make offerings one by one.

source_sentence: 爾時菩薩，不久悉成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Soon, the bodhisattva will attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，我居寶剎所有菩薩，身長十六由旬，得那羅延力，
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, those bodhisattvas of the jeweled buddha-lands where I dwell, sixteen yojanas in height, will attain the power of my supernormal knowledge.

source_sentence: 身相端嚴光明照曜，善根具足；
translation: Their bodies were beautiful and handsome, shining brilliantly. They possessed all the roots of goodness.

source_sentence: 成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: He accomplishes unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，我居寶剎所有菩薩，為諸眾生通達法藏，安立無邊一切智慧，
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, the enlightening beings who live in my jeweled buddha-lands establish boundless knowledge for sentient beings of the store of truth.

source_sentence: 斷盡諸結；
translation: They cut off all bonds.

source_sentence: 悉得證成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They'll all attain the realization of unsurpassed, correct enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，我居寶剎所有菩薩，以百千俱胝那由他種種珍寶造作香爐，
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, the bodhisattvas of my buddha-field built incense burners for me out of hundreds of thousands of koṭis of precious treasures.

source_sentence: 下從地際上至空界，常以無價栴檀之香，普薰供養十方諸佛；
translation: From the bottom of the earth up to the realm of space, they always offer priceless sandalwood incense as offerings to the Buddhas of the ten directions.

source_sentence: 令得速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: He causes them to quickly attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所居佛剎廣博嚴淨光瑩如鏡，悉能照見無量無邊一切佛剎，
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, the buddha-lands where I dwell are as vast and magnificent as mirrors shining purely like mirrors, able to illumine all the infinite and boundless buddha-lands.

source_sentence: 眾生覩者生希有心；
translation: Sentient beings who are contentious give rise to rare thoughts.

source_sentence: 不久速成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Soon, he'll quickly attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，我居寶剎所有菩薩，晝、夜六時恒受快樂，過於諸天，
translation: “Furthermore, as soon as I had attained enlightenment and become perfectly awake, the bodhisattvas living in my jeweled buddha-lands were more blissful day and night than the gods.

source_sentence: 入平等總持門，身光普照無邊世界；
translation: He entered the door of universal equanimity, and his physical light illumined boundless worlds.

source_sentence: 不久得成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: Soon, he'll attain unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有十方無量無邊無數世界一切女人，若有厭離女身者，
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly awakened, all the women in the infinite, boundless, and countless worlds of the ten directions who are disillusioned with a woman’s body

source_sentence: 聞我名號發清淨心歸依頂禮，彼人命終即生我剎成男子身；
translation: Those who hear my name and give rise to pure aspirations of faith, honoring me by bowing their foreheads. At the end of their life, they will be born in my buddha-field as men.

source_sentence: 悉皆令得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: They all cause them to attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有十方無量無邊無數佛剎聲聞、緣覺，聞我名號修持淨戒，
translation: “Once I have attained enlightenment and become perfectly awakened, all the śrāvakas and pratyekbuddhas of innumerable buddha-lands in the ten directions who hear my name observe pure precepts.

source_sentence: 堅固不退速坐道場；
translation: They are firm, unshakable, and quickly seated on the terrace of enlightenment.

source_sentence: 成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: He accomplishes unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有十方無量無邊不可思議無等佛剎一切菩薩，聞我名號五體投地禮拜歸命，
translation: “Furthermore, having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, all the bodhisattvas in the buddha-lands of the ten directions, which are infinite, boundless, incomparable, and peerless, who hear my name, prostrate themselves on the ground with five bodies, venerate me, and pay homage.

source_sentence: 復得天上人間一切有情，尊重恭敬親近侍奉增益功德；
translation: All sentient beings in the celestial realm honored, respected, venerated, and attended him with increasing virtue.

source_sentence: 成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: He accomplishes unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 「『世尊！
translation: 'Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 我得菩提成正覺已，所有眾生發淨信心，為諸沙門、婆羅門，染衣、洗衣、裁衣、縫衣、修作僧服，
translation: Having attained enlightenment and become perfectly enlightened, I give rise to pure faith in all sentient beings. For the sake of śramaṇas and brāhmaṇas I dye, wash, cut, sew, and make monk’s robes for them.

source_sentence: 或自手作或使人作，作已迴向；
translation: They may do it themselves, or they may ask others to do it; after doing so, they dedicate it back.

source_sentence: 是人所感，八十一生得最上衣隨身豐足，於最後身來生我剎；
translation: In the eighty-first lifetime, they obtained the highest robe and were fully empowered. In their last body they came to be born in our buddha-land.

source_sentence: 成就阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。』
translation: He accomplishes unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.'

source_sentence: 佛說大乘無量壽莊嚴經卷上
translation: Foshuo daishi wuliangshou zhuangyan jing, vol. 1
